name: RTCIceTransport.statechange_event
description: A statechange event occurs when the RTCIceTransport changes state. The state can be used to determine how far through the process of examining, verifying, and selecting a valid candidate pair is prior to successfully connecting the two peers for WebRTC communications.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: statechange - WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
